author: pipermerriam
content: Probably not viable to ban new deployments without something like EthereumObjectFormat (see <#706868829900505180> channel) being live which isn't happening anytime soon.  Also probably worth watching the recording of this morning's "State Expiry" call.  SELFDESTRUCT is briefly covered towards the end of the call.  Not a lot of new information but relevant.

author: pipermerriam
content: Current path that seems most valuable to explore is what happens if we redefine the opcode to be UNCONDITIONAL_SEND (it transfers full ETH balance and does nothing else).  What breaks?  What possible security holes does this leave us with if the assumption that contract code/nonce/state are cleared is broken.
